2.4.0.commit_description: Update against new SVT-AV1 v0.9 release and expose new preset options.

2.3.0.commit_description: Update against SVT-AV1 0.8.7, switch from enc-mode to preset, add 4K now that perf is faster etc.

2.2.1.commit_description: Build fix for GCC 10 default compiler flags.

2.1.1.commit_description: Fix GitHub breaking Windows download links.

2.0.0.commit_description: Update against SVT-AV1 0.6 upstream, add enc modes via https://github.com/phoronix-test-suite/test-profiles/pull/102

1.3.1.commit_description: Add Windows support using official release Windows binaries.

1.3.0.commit_description: Update against upstream SVT-AV1 0.5 release (also allows using official Windows binaries, TODO add support to the test profile)... Also addresses https://github.com/phoronix-test-suite/test-profiles/issues/75

1.2.0.commit_description: Update against latest SVT-AV1 Git for more performance work.

1.1.0.commit_description: Update against latest Git snapshot of SV1-AV1 for newest performance work.

1.0.1.commit_description: Also set cmake as possible external dependency.

1.0.0.commit_description: Initial commit of Intel open-source SVT-AV1 video encoder for AV1 recently open-sourced.
